titles: A briefe summe of divinitie shewing the plainest way, how a man ought to examine his waies in this life, to the attainment of eternitie : wherein the whole doctrine of Christian libertie is briefly handled, and may serve for instruction of all such as desire to exercise their guifts aright, which are in these our daies very much abused.
author: Downame, George, d. 1634.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
